title: Cajun Chicken Pasta
text: Chicken dredged in Cajun spices, sauteed with vegetables, and served in a basil-cream sauce over linguine is fit for royalty.

title: Penne With Spinach
text: Pasta with a spinach-blue cheese sauce.

title: Spaghetti
text: Spaghetti with garlic butter, bacon and prawns pasta.

title: Amatriciana
text: Feed the family with this creative tomato pasta meal, starring salty prosciutto and spicy chilli.
